desc: Local Craft Market and Coffee Shop in Tuamgraney, East-Clare selling local crafts, gifts, plants, vintage clothes, beauty products and local foods, bread & cafe. All products are locally made. Our coffee shop serves tea, coffee, cakes and savory food. Also available as take-away.

layout.text: East-Clare Trading Post is a local craft, gift and coffee shop in the picturesque village of Tuamgraney, located in East Clare.
